description: The Community Policing Project is intended to support national authorities in elaborating a national framework on community-based policing that provides for an accountable and closer working partnership between the civilian police and the communities.

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
- Project Management and operational costs, including procurement and Project staff commenced.
- Community Policing structure at state level established.
- Capacity Development , Training& Awareness Raising.
- Establishment of Local Safety Working Groups & Development of Community Safety Plans.
- Functional Community Safety Centers and Equipment of Community Policing Officers.
- Project Monitoring, Evaluation and Documentation of lessons learned.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Community Policing Project
